sense.name: Abuse, (as if) by hitting.
sense.commentary: Note: May be metaphorical and/or reflexive.
sense.examples: They sandbagged the politician. Don't sandbag me! He sandbagged himself into a corner. The team sandbagged themselves for the last game.

sense.name: Compel by coercion, threats, or other means.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] SANDBAG NP2[patient] to COMP
sense.examples: They sandbagged him to make dinner for everyone.

sense.name: Downplay one's ability in order to deceive.
sense.examples: The player sandbagged himself to other players in the tournament.

sense.name: Protect or strengthen with sandbags.
sense.examples: The residents sandbagged the beach front. Workers scrambled to sandbag the levy.
